An absolute masterpiece with constant updates. My only regrent is I overlooked this game at launch.

-2020 still a great game

-2021 Dec review change

-2022 may update

State of the game is horrible for killer rn.
Killer vs competent solo or swf: 1 guy loops you through 3 gyms, you manage to hit him then he uses boon heal to restore that hit while kiting u though more gyms. You eventually hit him 2 more times while 4 gens get done and when u go to pick him up you get flashlight to the face by 2 people.



"Why is the survivor queue so long?"



That's why.



It's simply not fun to play killer rn. That plus the nurf to like 6 killers and "reworked" addons like bayshores tooth on slinger actually makes reeling take LONGER. Very fun and cool addition to the game. Thanks behavior.

-may update 2022
Game is still balanced for solo surv while swf stomps the killer. A major balance update is dropping soon which reworks 40 perks and balances swf. Hopefully this is healthy for the game.

2022 07 21
很失望，制作组最后还是放弃解决游戏匹配机制问题和组排单排玩家平衡问题，这两个导致人屠矛盾尖锐的原因，而打算大量砍废主流技能来维持游戏寿命 ，有用吗? 

匹配机制

匹配机制从18年开开始改，年年改，年年被骂，开始出现了彩虹段，抓壮丁，排队十分钟游戏两分钟等夸张的现象，做不好可以理解，但免不了挨骂，毕竟这游戏在steam线人数也就两三万，匹配时间和公平性只能二选一，但就目前来看公平性是解决不了了，所以制作组选择摆烂，整了个匹配激励，意思就是哪边匹配的人少，就给哪边加血点，你们可不能骂我，我至少给你们解决匹配时间了。

单排和组排

单排组排问题就是到底要针对前者还是后者做游戏平衡的问题了，游戏初始的平衡性是按照单排进行的，单排逃生者之间没有沟通手段，屠夫可以利用信息差降低单排逃生者修机、解救的效率，而面对有语音交流的组排，屠夫取不到打信息差的优势，只能凭自身硬实力或碰运气去打，如果仍然按照单排对游戏做平衡，显然对屠夫玩家很不公平吧。
我们聪明的制作组早就注意到这个问题了，不管你是单排组排，只按照总的逃生率进行平衡，每场游戏四位逃生者，理想结果就是平均下来能跑两个，这就是平衡了，大家也肯定是这么认为的，那么好，就这么改了。然后把地图资源砍半，逃生者所有的加速类技能共用疲劳系统，自摸时间翻倍，修机时间70秒改为80秒，这是远古版本平衡的做法，是不是和今天的很像? 之后再经过无数次大大小小的调整，确实实现了场均二跑的效果。每当有人质疑游戏平衡，制作组就甩出数据，我们平衡做的很好，逃生率一直都是50%。事实上呢? 组排多出来的逃生率就得单排去偿还，对于那些游戏目标是跑出大门的玩家来说，压力是前所未有的大，什么拆钩流、摸宝流，通通不如速修流。想要向50%的逃生率靠拢，单排人只能拼了命地修机，去弥补和组排相比多出来的信息差。这次改版后，修机时间再加10秒，技能再次大砍，想着用同样的老套路去解决平衡问题，这次改动单排环境恐怕已经撑不下去了，速修已经反制不了守尸、人皇带不动匹配到的坑爹队友，火上浇油的匹配机制让单排环境恶臭不堪。这次平衡后单排玩家会少了一波，下次平衡性也许会针对组排来进行? 这可能就是制作组想要的结果吧，单排玩家想要游戏体验要么去玩屠夫，要么加入组排。既然制作组打算把单排玩家赶尽杀绝，那我选择直接退坑好了，在此祝愿没有单排人的杀机环境越来越好，在线人数蒸蒸日上。
Игра, как и многие, имеет свои недочеты. Но в остальном шик и блеск, не помню, когда так залипала в какой-либо игре!

Seen some hate for this game and the first time I played I didn't like it either, but I decided to give it another try and I am glad I did. This game keeps you on edge, has tons of replayability and is extremely fun, especially when you choose to be the killer. Killer xhoice has a wide variety which include some famous horro icons from movies like Freddy, Leather Face, and Micheal Myers, but htose all come with a price since they are DLC. The included killerse though are plenty and they all have their unique abilities and certian perks that you can unlock.
Good game :D

Great fun, exciting and very addictive game with smooth gameplay and good progression system. It really successfully incentivizes you to play again and again in order to level up your characters, get new items and perks.

However, it really sucks that when you reach max level with a certain survivor or a killer that you need to reset your level to zero and lose all your items and perks in order to progress any further. After I reached max level with one of my characters I really just gave up. I couldn't be bothered to start again from scratch and level them up all over again. Levelling the survivor up to max level took well over 50 hours of gameplay and I had amassed tons of items and perks which I don't want to lose.

Also, the game gets quite repetitive after a while. It really needs new game modes and/or different objectives (ways of escape) for the survivors other than just repairing generators again and again non-stop (because that's basically all you do in order to escape). This is a key element which Friday the 13th has over DbD. The survivors have so many more tools to work with, different objectives and way of escape (by car, boat, calling the police, killing Jason etc.).

The killers would also benefit from having different ways of killing survivors other than just hitting them twice (first to get the survivor into the wounded state, and a second time to get them into the dying state). This is one of the key points which Friday the 13th has over DbD. Playing Jason is so much more fun because you have so many abilities at your disposal and different ways of killing the survivors (with dozens of different executions etc.).

All in all, I would say Friday the 13th is the better choice in my opinion, but DbD is definitely not as glitchy and it has much smoother gameplay.
